explains: v. 污染，弄脏；毒害，腐蚀（人的思想或品德）

sentences.en: An urban food myth contends that if food spends just a few seconds on the floor, dirt and germs won't have much of a chance to contaminate it.
sentences.cn: 一个都市食物传奇里提到，如果食物只在地板上停留几秒钟，灰尘和细菌就不太有可能弄脏它。

sentences.en: Hostile relationships invidiously contaminate our wellbeing.
sentences.cn: 敌对关系损害我们的健康。

sentences.en: Previously, MTBE (methyl tertiary-butyl ether) was the oxygenate of choice, but fell out of favour in 2004 when it was found to contaminate ground water.
sentences.cn: 以前，MTBE（甲基叔丁基醚）曾作为汽油充氧剂，但是，在2004年，人们发现它污染了地下水，所以就不再使用它了。
